title: Airdrop
text: To get an airdrop, fill out the form
filled: You have already filled out the necessary data
text-2: You should buy a level to post this form
tokens-text: You get tokens for activating levels:
text-address: To add INSP token to your Metamask, first you need to click on 'Import tokens' and then choose 'Custom token'.
text-address-2: After that, enter a contract address in the 'Token contract address' line, press 'Add custom token'.
text-address-3: And then click on 'Import tokens'. Upon completing all these steps, INSP token will be displayed in your wallet.
want-get-tokens: Want to get 30 INSP tokens for free?!
